channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260111)
item.description:
What's New

Improve English detection and Brave browser support

  • Add vowel patterns (yo, ya, yi, yu, ou, ea) to impossible Vietnamese prefixes
  • Add 3-letter pattern 'yea' and 4-letter pattern 'thei' for English detection
  • Add BraveOmniboxViewViews detection for Brave browser address bar
  • Remove redundant browser address bar injection method block

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
